author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
To fix the bug of 2018 premixing wf if start from scratch. BS of 2017 was used. It seems normally, PdmV uses GS from StandardPU wf where BS is handled properly, so the issue has never been spotted.

#### PR validation:
`runTheMatrix.py --what premix -l 250200.18 --wm init`
provide proper configuration

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport will be for 10_6.
title: Define proper BS for 2018 premixing workflow if starting from scratch
